name: OneShot Golf: Robot Golf & Win
description:
Control Real-World Golfing Robots, compete against each other, and win real prizes!

OneShot Golf is a brand new skills-based mobile game that puts YOU in control of REAL-WORLD golfing robots for a true-to-life Esports experience!

Players compete against each other in daily tournaments for real life prizes on a selection of different golf courses.

Play today for free and win daily prizes!

Features:

- Live video action
- Daily tournament & prizes
- Remotely control real, physical golf robots
- Compete against your friends
- Collect and redeem points for prizes

We recommend a stable internet connection with a minimum 2 Mbps. Public WIFI is not recommended.
